Items not Available At The Shop
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: Items not Available At The Shop
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 4, 2002 - 10:26 pm:

Under Construction

ItemDescriptionEffect
DefCharmAn amulet that holds the spirit of a tough warrior.Gives Ironhart
EagleMaskCeremonial Eagle Mask with very sharp eyes.Gives Eagle Eye when used in combination.
Flare OrbFiery red orb glows with peerless beauty.
GadamonGod statue of Destr./Creat.Ups monster's abilities
IntStoneStone of knowledge. Increases a monster ability.Adds to Int but the amt varies depending on the combo.
LifStoneLife-force stone increases a monster abilityAdds to Life
LuckFragMysterious lucky fragment. Keep it bottled!Gives LuckStar
NunchakuEastern weapon. Almost seems alive.*Makes Raiden
SeeScrlScroll of secrets of anticipating attacksGives Foresee
StarPrunSweet Star Prune. Careful not to eat too much!
VicCharmVictory charm. Comes thru in the clutch.*Sucess trait given to combined baby
WndStonePower of Wind. Increases a monster ability. Adds to Acc.


* Item used when combining 2 monsters at the studio.
